Class Segment

java.lang.Object
us.mn.state.dot.tms.client.roads.Segment
public class Segment extends Object
A segment is the shape of a roadway segment on a map.
Author:
Douglas Lau

  • Constructor Details

    • Segment

      public Segment(R_NodeModel m, MapGeoLoc al, R_Node b, MapGeoLoc bl, R_Node s, MapGeoLoc sl, SampleDataSet sds, DetectorHash dhash)
      Create a new segment.
      Parameters:
      m - Upstream node model.
      al - Location of node at upstream end of segment.
      b - Node at downstream end of segment.
      bl - Location of node at downstream end of segment.
      s - Station node containing detectors for segment.
      sl - Location of station node.
      sds - Sample data set.
      dhash - Detector hash.

      public int getLane(int sh)
